entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Rain over southern sections this afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 mm over southern sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
